item.title: Wildcats Irony & Some Stormwatch
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Head over to the Wildstorm site, look down at the area that says "Message Boards", hopefully you will see a picture of one of the Coda and underneath it, the following: CODA WAR ONE How can the WILDCATS hope to survive? Easy, DON'T CANCEL IT YOU BASTARDS! (I added the link to the latest Wildcats issue) You may all now go about your business. Oh and Stormwatch #22 is out today. Pick it up, it's enjoyable.
